body.name: 2 Pack Replacement Charcoal Water Filters for Cuisinart Coffee Makers - Fits all Cuisinart Coffee Brewers

features: FITS ALL CUISINART MACHINES - These replacement charcoal water filters made by Valword will fit all Cuisinart coffee makers.
Enhanced Beverage Flavor - By effectively removing impurities, calcium, chlorine, and odors, these activated charcoal filters ensure a great-tasting, fresh home-brewed coffee experience every time.
PROTECT YOUR COFFEE MAKERS - Our charcoal boasts a strong absorption capacity and maximizes filtration efficiency, while protecting your coffee maker and extending its lifespan.

PREMIUM COCONUT HUSKS CHARCOAL - Premium activated charcoal has strong absorption capacity and allows for optimal water flow, preventing clogs while ensuring your coffee maker operates smoothly and efficiently.

COMPATIBLE MODELS - For use exclusively with the following model: CHW-12, DCC-1000BK, DCC-1100 Series, DCC-1200 DGB-600 DCC-2000, DCC-2200, DCC-750/BK, DCC-2600, DGB-700BC, DGB-900BC, DCC-2650, DCC-2750, DCC-3000, DCC-2800, DCC-2900, SS-300 and SS-700 DCC-1100, DCC-115O, DCC-1200, DCC-3200, DGB-500BK, DGB-550, DGB-600, DGB-700, DGB-475, CBC-00PC2, CBC-00WPC, DGB-500, DCC-1000, DCC-1400, CBC-001, CBC-002, CBC-00BKPC, CBC-SA002, DCC-900.
body.description: Start Every Day with Valword Charcoal Water Filters98% of Coffee consists of water. That is why it is important to make sure that your cup of coffee has filtered water that is completely clean. Valword charcoal water filters remove chlorine, odors, calcium and other water impurities prior to brewing your favorite coffee, ensure your water remains clean and fresh. The simple-to-install design makes everything easy, simply replace after 60 days. Compatible with all Cuisinart Coffee Machines:For use with models CHW-12, DCC-1000BK, DCC-1100 Series, DCC-1200 DGB-600 DCC-2000, DCC-2200, DCC-750/BK, DCC-2600, DGB-700BC, DGB-900BC, DCC-2650, DCC-2750, DCC-3000, DCC-2800, DCC-2900, SS-300 and SS-700 DCC-1100, DCC-115O, DCC-1200, DCC-3200, DGB-500BK, DGB-550, DGB-600, DGB-700, DGB-475, CBC-00PC2, CBC-00WPC, DGB-500, DCC-1000, DCC-1400, CBC-001, CBC-002, CBC-00BKPC, CBC-SA002, DCC-900.VALWORD coffee water filters use high-grade micro-mesh material and ionized charcoal granulates to ensure that your coffee machine will not be broken or stained and that the water in your coffee will be contaminant free. The final result is one great tasting cup of coffee after another.Charcoal water filter protects the life of your coffee machineCoffee Machines without proper water filters have shorter life spans than Coffee Machines.Installing your new filter is a breeze! Simply follow these steps:Soak the filter in water for 15 minutes.Hold the filter under running cold tap water for 30 seconds.Insert the water filter into your coffee machine.Savor your delicious beverage!Click "Add to Cart" now and elevate your coffee experience with the exceptional taste you deserve!

reviews.reviewText: I was looking for replacement Cuisinart coffee machine filters and these worked perfectly. I was not paid to write this review but using these filters really made a difference in my coffee taste. Suggest replacing your more often too!
